title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 5-1.29 - Pumping equipment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 5-1.29 - Pumping equipment

State Regulations

Pumping equipment of a public water system, for water which is not subject to later treatment, shall be installed and operated to prevent contamination of the public water system. Whenever priming is necessary, such pump shall be primed with water meeting the requirements of sections 5-1.51 and
5-1.52
of this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
5-1.29

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
